description.ko: 고대 블랙홀 주위로 빛이 굴절되고 성운의 먼지가 절대 침묵의 공허 속에서 기묘한 구조를 형성하는, 우주의 가장 먼 심연으로의 하강.
description.en: A descent into the furthest reaches of the cosmos, where light bends around ancient black holes and nebular dust forms haunting structures in the absolute silence of the void.

prompt: VOID-3 theme, cosmic deep, cinematic wide shot, swirling dark nebula, gravitational lensing, supermassive black hole silhouette, photorealistic, 8k resolution, eerie blue and violet hues, stardust particles, deep space exploration, hyper-detailed, ethereal lighting, obsidian void environment.
